website_summaries.verdict: This stand's sleek, minimalist design makes it a natural choice for both frosting and serving.
pros: Non-skid pedestal base keeps stand in place for decorating
Stainless steel bearings for smooth rotation
cons: Spins so easily that it can accidentally move while frosting
Platter does not detach from pedestal

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and turns smoothly
customer_reviews.text: I am a certified baker and was looking for a good quality cake stand with an affordable price.I love this revolving cake stand, it's not only great looking, but it is also sturdy, it turns very smoothlly. The non-slip pad is very helpful,I am sure it will make the crumb coating and decorating of the cakes easier and effortless. It can also be used to show off your desserts. I definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Juice

customer_reviews.title: Best I’ve owned!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had several plastic Cake stands that spin and they were pretty good, but I love this cake stand! It spins with ease and is very sturdy. The cakes I make usually have a cheesecake center, which makes them very heavy, and this stand withstood the test. Plus I didn’t have any difficulty decorating due to the ease of the spin, albeit I’m not much of a decorator. I was able to finish my cake with no problem. If spinning while decorating is an issue for you, I’ve found that by placing a hair tie around the base of the stand, where the spinning occurs (see pic), it slowed the spin almost to complete stop. Hope that helps! 😊
customer_reviews.author: Shaquitia

customer_reviews.title: Passed the sister-in-law test.
customer_reviews.text: As I have mentioned before, I am a cook, not a baker. My wife is. Her sisters are. The quality, fit, finish, and perceived value for dollar spent is outstanding. Time will tell about the durability, but I suspect it will be fine. I make this observation because shortly after the cake stand arrived, so did my sisters in law and when I witnessed this fivesome of mature, accomplished women poking, and awwing at this thing like a newborn grandchild, recommended? Yes.
customer_reviews.author: Dave H

customer_reviews.title: Also works as a lazy Susan!
customer_reviews.text: I don't use it for its intended purpose, but it's so gorgeous it does exactly what I need! the turning action is almost TOO smooth! If you barely touch it it will keeping turning & turning.
customer_reviews.author: A. K. Whitman

customer_reviews.title: With a super smooth spin and heavy duty build, it's a win win!
customer_reviews.text: I was a bit apprehensive about ordering this unit and decided to give it a chance with the few great reviews. I am so happy I did. I have been using an IKEA one that doesn't have nearly as many rotations the Ohuhu does from 1 spin. I mean it just spins for days and so smooth. The bearings used are what contributes to that. I was going to shell out the extra $$ for the common Ateco version and I'm sure the Ohuhu is equally as good if not better.
customer_reviews.author: Ben E.

customer_reviews.title: BUY THIS TURNTABLE! A+++!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I have used this twice since receiving it. I had a cheap plastic one before this, so the upgrade was needed. THIS TURNTABLE IS AWESOME! It’s a clean, smooth spin, it doesn’t jiggle or tilt. It’s just an overall great product. I make A LOT of cakes and holy moly this stand makes my buttercream cakes in the picture look like fondant. DO NOT HESITATE! Buy this one!
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Zepeda

customer_reviews.title: Turns so easily it is almost impossible to decorate cakes on it.
customer_reviews.text: Review for Cake Stand, Ohuhu Aluminium Revolving Cake Turntable 12'' Rotating Cake Decorating Stand. It is a nice cake stand, it is heavy and looks good. I guess this will be good when I need to twirl a cake around at high speed but to try to decorate a cake on it is pretty much impossible. The turntable spins so easily that it won't stay still long enough for you to decorate the cake.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Shiny Perfection!
customer_reviews.text: So pleased with this purchase! I wanted a sturdy revolving cake stand for a while now. But too many are too expensive or too short. This one is the perfect height off the counter. It spins very smoothly with the barest touch. Plus it is shiny. In the picture the base looks like a matte grey, but it is actually a shiny glitter like surface. And I don't mind leaving it on my kitchen counter because it fits in nicely with my stainless steel kitchen. 10 out of 10 would recommend!
customer_reviews.author: DeAnna Hughes

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: I've got to say how surprise I was to have found this icing table. Not only does it look exactly like in the pictures but the product itself is great. The speed when you turn is fast and the top does not fall off like some of the icing cake tables that I've used. I loved that the table is heavy and stable. If you are looking for affordable and good quality icing cake table, this one is the winner.
customer_reviews.author: Veetisserie

customer_reviews.title: Continues to rotate as I'm trying to ice cakes. ...
customer_reviews.text: Continues to rotate as I'm trying to ice cakes. Irritating and impossible to get to stay still. Not practical for my use.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Morales

customer_reviews.title: Very attractive and functional in several ways. Good purchase.
customer_reviews.text: This is actually very attractive. Very modern looking. It twirls easily. I like the fact there are subtle rings at various measurements from the edge which really help with cake centering/balanced placement on the plate. The subtle rings also helped to keep the icing at a consistent thickness. I will try and attach a photo later. But beware, the top surface easily scratches.. so use a plastic cake server to protect the finish. Very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Ireland Rules

customer_reviews.title: Best Buy for your buck
customer_reviews.text: Best value , smooth operation ! I fact ordered another was impressed weight , stable non slip feet and holds cake well to decorate ! Awesome For the money have more expensive ones not as good !!!
customer_reviews.author: tattoowarrior69Top Contributor: Photography

customer_reviews.title: Cannot Go Wrong
customer_reviews.text: I am in the early stages of perfecting my cake decorating skills. This set was perfect. The turntable is sturdy, spins smoothly making icing application a breeze. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: CindyC

customer_reviews.title: Quiet, smooth,  and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: I don't pretend to be a professional, or think my cakes are better than others, but I do try to stand out. I knew there was a way to decorate without being messy, but until this little turn table, I didn't know what I was looking for. I think I saw something on P1intere$t, which caught my eye. Then I researched cake turntables on how to elevate the baking game. I chose this particular turntable more the base (heavy, rubber mat to grip counter tops) and the spin (quiet and smooth). The bonus is the plastic and dishwasher-safe tools to use for decorating. Nice! And yes, the first time using it met my expectations. I'm glad I found this.
customer_reviews.author: Tim and Juanita

customer_reviews.title: Great Value and product
customer_reviews.text: This cake stand is perfect. It's sturdy, but not heavy like the iron one at my work. It's tall enough to make the spinning easy to do, turns great, easy to wipe down and clean. Plus this was way cheaper than the ones at the cake supply store nearby and it arrived within a couple of days. Also as a perk, it does come with a couple of extra supplies so you get a little more for your money. Extra scrapers and spatulas are always a plus.
customer_reviews.author: D. Warren

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic for applying glaze on pottery, i.e., as a "banding wheel."
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to use to apply glazes, slip etc. to my pottery pieces. It is better than the official banding wheels we have at the studio of which I am a member, which currently list for $57 on my favorite discount pottery supply site.
customer_reviews.author: lovescatsandkids

customer_reviews.title: Obsessed
customer_reviews.text: I am in love with this thing. I’ve never before baked a cake but I wanted to make a beautiful smash cake for my daughter’s first birthday. I watched a million tutuorials and everyone recommended a turntable. After scouring the products on Amazon I decided to spend a bit more for this metal one and I am so glad I did! It spins like a dream, is easy to clean, and makes decorating a breeze. It’s packaged nicely and securely between 2 styrofoam pieces on both the top and bottom so I can safely store it away in my basement (I have a small kitchen) until I need to use it again. Would definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and Level
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for a huge wedding cake I was making. It was sturdy enough to hold four big layers of 12" diameter cake, turned very smoothly, and was very level. I recommend this for home bakers or professionals. It's a little bit difficult to clean because of the circular striations of the metal, but I put plastic wrap over it to make cleaning a breeze. Highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Bea

customer_reviews.title: Great cake stand upgrade!
customer_reviews.text: I previously had a plastic wilton cake turntable. This one is so much more substantial. The turn is so smooth and the weight of it helps propel it. Absolutely ecstatic!
customer_reviews.author: Schnabel

customer_reviews.title: Pastry Chef Approved
customer_reviews.text: I’m a professional pastry chef and I recently bought this for myself hoping it would be almost as good as the ones I have used in my kitchens. Luckily for me, it’s better than the ones I’ve used in my kitchens. It rotates amazingly; the bearings are very smooth so you can spin it once and it’ll spin for quite a while. The surface is ridged so the cake circle doesn’t slide around, but it’s still very easy to clean with a damp sponge. I’m definitely very happy.
customer_reviews.author: hainabear

customer_reviews.title: Didn't get to use but it's worth the buy!
customer_reviews.text: I ended up returning this turntable because I no longer needed it for what I planned to use it for. However, I realized when it arrived that it was much heavier than I thought it would be, showing that it is very sturdy. It glides smoothly when turning, facilitating the icing process. It's a beautiful aluminum material that looks very high quality. I really have no complaints and wish I saw it in use!
customer_reviews.author: K. Mitchell

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: I am an amateur cake decorator and wanted to buy a cake turntable, just like the pros use in their videos that I watch every day. You can definitely spend as much money as you want to, but this one was reasonably priced and to me, a fantastic buy for the money. It has a nice heavy weight to it, giving me confidence to use it for my tallest cakes but easy enough to handle so that I'm not having to struggle to carry it. I would definitely buy this again.
customer_reviews.author: jdnixboe

customer_reviews.title: A must for cake decorating!
customer_reviews.text: I love this cake stand. It's very stable, easy to clean, and sturdy for heavy cakes. Thank goodness I didn't buy a cheap plastic stand. It turns very smoothly to decorate cakes. I store mine away in the original box and pull it out as needed and haven't had any issues with rust or anything like that. I'm really happy that I made this purchase and would totally recommend it to any beginner baker.
customer_reviews.author: Mammasan

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this for preparations for making a 6 layer, 3 tier wedding cake. It made frosting the cake so much easier. I love that the stand is heavy with a non skid bottom so it stays in place while I work. I had only ever seen plastic ones before so I was really happy when I discovered this. Great investment!
customer_reviews.author: Swamp Girl

customer_reviews.title: You can’t go wrong with this cake stand
customer_reviews.text: I do cakes out of my home and i needed some extra tools. I love this cake stand! My mother got me a lighter one a while back but I wanted something with some weight. This was perfect! Not too heavy, just right! It spins like a dream, it’s easy to clean (I always hand wash mine) and it’s super durable. You can’t go wrong with this one. It’s also beautiful if I ever need to take pictures of my products.
customer_reviews.author: Luke&Leah

customer_reviews.title: The best revolving cake stand out there
customer_reviews.text: I searched high & low for a turning cake stand and this is THE ONE. Look no further because it has everything you need. Quality, durable, attractive (multi use) and great for the price. I couldn't be happier.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy

customer_reviews.title: These are fantastic! The photos do not do the build quality ...
customer_reviews.text: These are fantastic! The photos do not do the build quality justice. The underside of the cake table is a reinforced solid casting. The base of the stand is heavy in order to prevent tip over. The top rotates smoothly and with no wobble making both cake preparation and serving very easy. I have had professional caterers ask me where I got these cake stands and want to buy them from me.
customer_reviews.author: JTS

customer_reviews.title: Great bearings
customer_reviews.text: This turntable is absolutely amazing! I am a beginner, and I am making my first wedding cake this year, and needed a turntable that spins easier than my cheap Wilton one does. This has great reviews however a couple of people said they can't decorate their cake because it spins too much. I did not find that to be an issue at all. I would not hesitate to recommend this to family!
customer_reviews.author: Jamie

customer_reviews.title: Missing extras!
customer_reviews.text: Love the turntable. No icing spreader or decorating combs as advertised!!
customer_reviews.author: C. Beverly

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: I just received this yesterday and it is SO NICE! It’s taller than other brands I was looking at and it’s so sturdy! It’s so shiny and The turntable glides so easily. I can’t wait to use it!
customer_reviews.author: Rayna Carroll

customer_reviews.title: Great buy for the money
customer_reviews.text: Love the way it turns - smooth as silk without hesitation. Looks beautiful, so you could serve your cake on it. Not flimsy. Feels very sturdy. Good height. Couldn’t be happier.
customer_reviews.author: Ethereal

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Great product!!!! Used it for the first time to make my first 2 layer carrot cake. The turntable is smooth. Can also be used when guests come to your home to display your beautiful cake!! Would buy again or gift it to a friend!!! By the way it was my first time making a cake and using a turntable
customer_reviews.author: Gina Picinic

customer_reviews.title: Smooth!
customer_reviews.text: Wow this cake spinner runs like a luxury car! Super smooth and quiet. It isn't bumpy and slow like many other spinning stands I've shopped for. It was worth the price. Very well made. Wished I bought this first. Also - the heavy metal finish shows it is a quality product.
customer_reviews.author: RHR3

customer_reviews.title: Good quality and spins fluidly.
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent product that works well. It’s sturdy and spins very smoothly. It’s easy to clean. I use it to spin canvases with acrylic paint but obviously it’s originally made for cake decorating. It comes with a couple tools that are nice too. Good purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Lori

customer_reviews.title: Excellent turntable
customer_reviews.text: This is actually a really great product. The table turns so smooth and it feels very durable. Not plastic and crappy. It is lighter than a lot of stands I've used so it is easier to pick up. Might be really helpful for some people :D highly recommend! The extras that it comes with aren't bad either.
customer_reviews.author: UnEarhtlyGirl

customer_reviews.title: Love this!!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this cake stand after reading all of the wonderful reviews. I must say, this product does not disappoint. It is amazingly smooth. I've make cakes for several years - I have no idea why I've never bought this before now. It arrived the day I was making a two tiered cake - after putting all that heavy cake on there, it still turned like there was nothing on the stand. LOVE THIS STAND!!!
customer_reviews.author: Denise

customer_reviews.title: Go ahead and order the stand. Won’t regret it.
customer_reviews.text: Super smooth as it rotates which makes frosting cakes much easier. Nice quality & pretty heavy. I like it better than a Wilton cast iron stand I purchased. I didn’t regret this purchase at all! Price point is great and was a deciding factor for me over the Alteco options.
customer_reviews.author: Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: it turned very smoothly,and closed to be silent ,not extremely heavy however it’s very stable! I bought a marble cake Turntable and return it back to Thomas, because this one is light and easy to use .
customer_reviews.author: Jessica w.

customer_reviews.title: Not all things have to cost alot to be the best.
customer_reviews.text: When item received it was packaged very well. No damage in shipping. The polished surface of the turn table turns eyes very appealing. This turn table wants to move its self the ball bearings are so smooth that it will keep going if you let it... I have Been a Bakery Manager for 18 years and in that time have used many turn tables. This is far the best for the money I have found.
customer_reviews.author: michael weston

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy
customer_reviews.text: I'm very happy with this turntable. I debated on going all out and purchasing one of the weightier (cast iron) based turntables, but this one is plenty heavy enough for stability. It rotates very smoothly and is a step up from a cake plate on a Lazy Susan (my old way of frosting a cake).
customer_reviews.author: Michael GrantTop Contributor: Baking

customer_reviews.title: Best ever very durable
customer_reviews.text: Amazing just dont ever put in the dishwasher because the shine will go away as you can see in my picture however it looked exactly like the picture originally
customer_reviews.author: Kendra P

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: This is my second review of this product, having purchased one before this. I am a potter, and a good banding wheel that is stable and turns smoothly is a great help. This "cake wheel" serves very well as a potter's banding wheel for about half the price!
customer_reviews.author: William H. Moore Jr.

customer_reviews.title: makes life easier!
customer_reviews.text: Very nice and attractive cake stand. Works like a dream and makes icing a cake so much easier. I have even used is as a serving stand and just put the cake stand lid on it. The accessory pieces are also easy to use and do the job
customer_reviews.author: t-six

customer_reviews.title: Great for decorating
customer_reviews.text: If you’re like me and decorate cakes for a living or on the side, this is a fantastic addition to your arsenal.
customer_reviews.author: Davenportal10

customer_reviews.title: A must have
customer_reviews.text: A must have for any cake decorator - even a novice like me. I don’t know why I waited so long to purchase one of these. It makes decorating a cake so much easier and prevents errors. This is Very sturdy and I am pleased with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Cake Stand
customer_reviews.text: My wife loves this cake stand. The second you pick it up you can tell that it's made of real materials but it isn't super heavy. It turns really easy and has been really easy to use and clean. If you are looking for a cake stand this one is great.
customer_reviews.author: Stuart B.

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and smooth, makes decorating much easier
customer_reviews.text: I love this stand! It's very smooth, the bottom weight is great so it doesn't slip and it's sturdy. Fro the price, it really can't be beat.
customer_reviews.author: Suzanna W

customer_reviews.title: Dont recommend
customer_reviews.text: The cake stand is off by at least 1/16 inch. You can clearly see it as its spinning. Makes it harder to stack and ice. I wouldnt recommend buying it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Product
customer_reviews.text: If you are an average baker and need a quick and easy way to get a cake frosted that looks professional, this is your item. Sturdily made from heavy aluminum, it turns easily on ball bearings (I assume) and was a great addition to my kitchen baking gadgets. Very reasonably priced as well.
customer_reviews.author: D. S.

customer_reviews.title: A cake turntable that will turn heads
customer_reviews.text: I love this cake turntable; it's sleek, solid, and really is a high quality tool. I've watched a lot of professional bakers on Craftys and Creative Bug to realize that many of them use this exact same turntable. I highly recommend - high quality without breaking the bank.
customer_reviews.author: Rob

customer_reviews.title: Very Smooth
customer_reviews.text: I own a home-based cake shop and this is a great addition to my tools. Turns very smoothly, even when decorating a filled, double layer 14" cake tier. The non-slip base is nice and sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Linda

customer_reviews.title: Quality Cake Spinner for Paint Pours works great!
customer_reviews.text: Pouring paint & spinning it. This thing spins like crazy!! It’s fast and sturdy. Heavy duty cake spinner that did exactly what I needed. It came with a long offset spatula & a couple of spreaders with notches. I also use the spreaders for resin & after curing the resin comes right off. A great deal with unexpected goodies!
customer_reviews.author: DebraJoJo

customer_reviews.title: Worth Every Penny!
customer_reviews.text: *slaps hood of cake stand* This baby has had three cakes frosted on it since I purchased it, and it works like a dream! It’s incredibly well-priced for the quality, and with the icing spatula and decorators included as well, it’s a freakin’ steal! If you’re skeptical, don’t be! I promise you won’t regret it! The turn is smooth, not at all bumpy, and the surface is so easy to clean! This product is absolutely perfect for bakers on a budget (like myself), and I would recommend it to anyone who asked!
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Amazing cake stand!
customer_reviews.text: This product is amazing! It has a heavier base so it is very sturdy and easy to turn to decorate cakes. The spatula is very sturdy and the three scrapers that came for the icing were honestly a life saver! I can’t wait to use the different edges for different styles of cake!
customer_reviews.author: a.m.

customer_reviews.title: Very Solid
customer_reviews.text: The cake stand is weighted and does not wander around. The bearings are quite smooth moving. Very easy to use and not difficult to clean. The included tools are of good quality. The only improvement that I would request is a snap on lid for transporting cakes. I would buy this again
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Makes decorating a piece of cake . . .
customer_reviews.text: Brilliantly glistening aluminum finish. Turns smoothly, ball-bearing unit well made. Can be used for displays, not just for cake decorating. Love it! The "yes-spin zone."
customer_reviews.author: lawrence anthony

customer_reviews.title: Just what I needed!
customer_reviews.text: I wish I had bought this ages ago for my first baking adventure. I turns so smoothly and is very sturdily built. It also has a rubber grip on the bottom to keep it from moving around while you're working. Couldn't be happier with this!
customer_reviews.author: Lynne

customer_reviews.title: THE one your looking for is right here!
customer_reviews.text: I love it! Perfect in every way! Solid weight, slip resistant bottom, smooth spinning. Perfect!
customer_reviews.author: SBrooks

customer_reviews.title: Aluminium is worth the purchase
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice revolving cake platter. I didn't opt to spend the extra money and I wasn't sure what to expect but I wasn't sorry. It is study and spins nicely. I am a home baker and a novice cake decorator. I just wanted to make it easier on myself when I decorate cakes. The Test Kitchen had recommended another platter that was more money however I am so happy that I bought this item. I think the Test Kitchen needs to review this.
customer_reviews.author: Giggi

customer_reviews.title: Smooth spinning!
customer_reviews.text: I was in between this and another more expensive turn table and price won me over on this. I’m glad I went with this one. Besides the bonus accessories, this turntable is heavy and well balanced. It turns perfectly with no variation or wobbling. It’s easy to clean and with the rubber on the bottom, it stays in place.
customer_reviews.author: Sara

customer_reviews.title: Solid/good quality
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for a cake decorating class and was pleasantly surprised by the quality of the stand. It's really solid and turns so easily. Mine was a few inches higher than those bought by two of my friends, and I think it makes it a bit easier to use when I decorate. I don't anticipate using it much for cake decorating (not a big hobby), but a friend suggested it would be a good lazy susan type device for the table.
customer_reviews.author: denise37

customer_reviews.title: The best for your money.
customer_reviews.text: This product is money well spent. The wife bakes and sells cakes and she loves this cake spinner. It's smooth to spin, it grips the counter and it's nice to look at.
customer_reviews.author: CAMILLE

customer_reviews.title: Its like a fidget spinner lazy susan
customer_reviews.text: This cake stand spins like a fidget spinner. It's so smooth, but it doesnt keep turning while you're working which is great. The rubber bottom does come off too easily and I actually managed to lose it during transit. The grooves are a little hard to clean. Just make sure you dont run water over it and it won't rust and will keep on spinning.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah D

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT!!!
customer_reviews.text: Love love love love love! To sum it up, I LOVE it lol this is coming from someone who had the jankity Wilton one. I didn’t realize how bad that one spun until I got this one
customer_reviews.author: Schuyler

customer_reviews.title: A beauty to have
customer_reviews.text: Really enjoyed my cake wheel. Definitely makes decorating cakes a whole lot easier. Spins very smoothly, sturdy, heavy bottom so it doesn't slide around on you when trying to use it but not too heavy that you can't lift it. It's very easy to lift and place. Looks very wonderful too.
customer_reviews.author: GGTop Contributor: Baking

customer_reviews.title: I purchased this turntable for my fiancé and she loved it. It is has some weight
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this turntable for my fiancé and she loved it. It is has some weight, so it doesn't feel cheap and it looks great on the counter with or without a cake on it. Turns smooth with little force, but enough resistance that it doesn't spin to far while icing a cake. Great purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Tim Balderrama

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous
customer_reviews.text: Just used it for the first time and it makes cake decorating a breeze! i can't believe I have gone this long without this rotating cake stand. You will not be disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: Secret squirrel

customer_reviews.title: Very Sturdy!
customer_reviews.text: Just received my cake stand and I am very impressed with the quality. I can't wait to use it. I will post a photo! Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Ms. Jay

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I needed!
customer_reviews.text: I love to bake as a fun outlet and have been wanting to step up my decorating game and this did the trick. Turns so smoothly, good quality, and heavy base to keep it stable. Great product for the price!
customer_reviews.author: Lindsey B.

customer_reviews.title: Rotating cake plate/sculpture stand
customer_reviews.text: What a deal!!!!! This rotating stand is incredible. Beautiful enough to exhibit your baked goods, or sturdy and convenient enough to create a piece of art.
customer_reviews.author: Reynolds

customer_reviews.title: Buy it.
customer_reviews.text: I had a cheap Wilton turntable and this one blew it out of the water. It’s heavy enough to stay in place while decorating but not be a burden when moving it for storage It spins sturdily with no wobble, and it’s easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: katbruns

customer_reviews.title: Best turn table for me
customer_reviews.text: Am amazed at this turn table. Super sturdy. Beautifully built. I love every detail about it.
customer_reviews.author: Olga Cowo

customer_reviews.title: Great product.
customer_reviews.text: This is a really great quality, heavy weight cake stand. It turns so smooth. I chose to get this one piece instead of the 2 piece because I've had those deteriorate and get wobbly after a while so hopefully this one won't. The only con so far is that the rubber bottom is a bit loose after a couple weeks of use but it stays on fine while using the stand.
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: Awesome cake stand
customer_reviews.text: I've been wanting a spinning cake stand for years and this one is awesome! Great quality and comes with accessories so you don't have to order them separately . It washes easy and hasn't lost it's finish. So glad I ordered this one and not at a heavy expense. I've already used it a few times since I ordered it in December.
customer_reviews.author: Tracey

customer_reviews.title: Smooth rotation; heavy-duty cake stand!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this after reading reviews on this product and others. I received it; haven't used it yet, but it turns so nicely, it will make cake decorating much easier. The silver finish is so nice, it could be used to serve the cake also. This is a heavy-duty turntable and it's worth the price!
customer_reviews.author: C. N. Robertson

customer_reviews.title: Great turn table and spatula
customer_reviews.text: My cakes are nearly professional looking now! The turn table and spatula are wonderful. Disappointed in the icing scraper. It's not very tall.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I love this turn table! I’m new at cake decorating. So, for me it’s a great way to start and learn. The turn table is smooth and the tools are great! I would buy it again!

customer_reviews.title: Smooth and steady
customer_reviews.text: Smooth and steady. It is heavier than I thought it would be. It will not tip over unless you try to tip it. It rotates smoothly, you can tell it is made with high standards in all aspects

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely perfect!
customer_reviews.text: This cake stand is possibly the best I've ever bought. Turning this stand feels smooth and easy - making the frosting and decorating process easier. The stand is heavy enough that it is sturdy and looks nice too.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Smooth
customer_reviews.text: I bought this item according to great review. It is quite heavy, stable, and turntable is smooth and quiet. It is made of all metal so it's everlasting.

customer_reviews.title: Would buy this again and again... great gift.. quality product!  Delivery smooth and all is well
customer_reviews.text: Everything they say it is. Turns very easily... very sturdy .. quality product. Gave it to my daughter for her birthday and she loves it too, as do her 3 daughters. Thank you! Also delivered promptly.

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely the best gift I have given to myself lately
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely the best gift I have given to myself lately. I don't know why I waited so long. The turntable turns smoothly which is so beneficial when icing a buttercream cake or applying decorations.
customer_reviews.author: Sheron Hinson Roberts

customer_reviews.title: Love It!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had this cake stand for a little over 2 weeks now and I’ve used it on about 10 cakes and I absolutely love it! It’s the perfect height, it’s sturdy enough to hold my cakes without feeling wobbly like my last stand, and it looks great when taking pictures of my cakes. I haven’t used the offset spatula or icing combs that come with it yet so I can’t speak for their quality. I would absolutely recommend this cake stand to anyone who’s looking.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Worth the buy you’re gonna love it

customer_reviews.title: Spins very smoothly - happy with purchase
customer_reviews.text: It spins very smoothly and was everything I hoped it would be. I am not for sure that it's 100% level, but 98-99% is good enough for me since I'm not a professional or even frequent baker.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Gift!

I won’t hesitate to purcgase again.

customer_reviews.text: Not flimsy and cheap feeling. Nice weight. Rotates smoothly when frosting/decorating. Top diameter is 12.25 inches. Height from countertop 5.25 inches. Price was fair. Would recommend.

customer_reviews.title: I highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: I was actually really pleasantly surprised at the quality of both the materials & the performance/wear. I use this revolving cake stand pretty much every day for visual displays and its maintained it’s integrity throughout. All pieces are engineered to be weight-proportionate so it rotates very smoothly, with no sound or wobbling. And for this price, you won’t find a better deal.

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy cake stand
customer_reviews.text: Very consistent rotation, and it looks good. The top is textured so the cake drum doesn't slide off, but that makes it a bit harder to clean. The offset spatula is perfectly functional. Overall a great product.
customer_reviews.author: JM

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE IT
customer_reviews.text: I had been browsing other sites, even Walmart and their revolving cake tables were all about $50-80. You always wonder if lower priced items are as good quality. This product is phenomenal though. I just started baking and this fits my needs perfectly. The turn is SO smooth! its sturdy, easy to clean, and has the silicone mat on the bottom to prevent it from sliding around the counter. Amazed with this product for the price!
customer_reviews.author: Lexis

product_meta.title: Cake Stand, Ohuhu Aluminium Revolving Cake Turntable 12'' Rotating Cake Decorating Stand with Angled Icing Spatula and Comb Icing Smoother, Banking Cake Decorating Supplies
feature_bullets: SAFE: Stay safe while you eat, with a product that lasts. Made from heavy-duty aluminum, this cake stand will last through countless events. Plus, the anti-slip surface on top makes sure the cake stays in place when you’re decorating, carrying or cutting it!
ANTI-SLIP RUBBER PAD: The worst way to end a party is to spill the cake on the ground! A stable 7.3 inch base gives plenty of stability, while the rubber pad on the bottom prevents slippage.

SMOOTH REVOlVING STAND: You need a smooth, consistent revolving motion for decorating, and there’s nothing worse than a squeaky or jerky action on a cake turntable. Thanks to the stainless steel bearings, there’s no painful friction sounds so you can turn smoothly every time.

BONUS ACCESSORIES: To get your cake decorating even father, we’ve included 3 silicone decorating combs and 1 stainless steel scraper. Plus, with 12 different patterns, you can create all sorts of incredible textures, smooth the sides of the cake, etc. Finally get the perfect cake you’ve been wanting to make!

DURABLE AND CLEANS EASILY: You don’t want old food bits dirtying up your next cake, but cleaning can be a pain. All you have to do, though, is add a dash of dish soap and warm water onto the plate and it will be sparkling clean in seconds! Built to withstand years in the kitchen, we guarantee its durability!
